name: spo-mailchimp-integration
title: Integrate MailChimp Campaigns API with SPO to create wiki pages based on email sent from MailChimp
shortDescription: Demonstrates how to retrieve sent email campaigns from MailChimp, and save them as wiki pages on SPO. The script retrieves the HTML content of the email, downloads all images into a local folder and uploads to a SPO document library, replaces all mccontent image tags to point to SPO, and create and publish a wiki page

thumbnails.alt: Preview of the sample Integrate MailChimp Campaigns API with SPO to create wiki pages based on email sent from MailChimp

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
